Comment: There is a statistically significant difference between the Intermarginal and Interior Zones of the scholia which happen to occur at the beginning of a scholia line.
There is no significant difference between zones of intermarginal scholia, no matter if they appear on a recto or verso page.
There is no significant difference between zones of interior scholia on verso and recto pages.
There is a significant difference between the Inteermarginal and Interior zones which happen to occur at the end of an Iliad line.
